resources.string: Click the button to start\ncounting your star\njumps
Share the app with your friends
Hey! I\'m using StarJump app (play store) and it\'s amazing! Come and install it.
Can\'t be shared as you don\'t have this app!
Please mark each jump well\nso the app can detect it
Congratulations! You reached your goal of\n%1$d jumps in a perfect time of\n%2$dm %3$ds %4$sms
Hey! I\'ve just done %1$d star jumps in just %2$d minutes, %3$d seconds and %4$d milliseconds! Can you beat me? Install StarJump app on play store.
